title.rendered: Registered Nurse – Sales Position | Tulsa, OK

content.rendered:
Registered Nurse – Sales Position | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm
  • 3+ years experience, prefer Med/Surg experience
  • Must have strong customer service skills
  • Will speak with hospital executives and staff regarding monitoring and tech needs
  • Will be trained
  • $20-$25/hour
